channel.title: Need help with a NPC problem
channel.description:
Base - Bulby * Type - 508
Okay, I need help with these problems:
(1) Adding items that my Jungle Demon drops. (Ex: Armadyl Godsword - 11694) (2) Adding a rate at which these items are dropped. (Wanting around 30% rate, please put in TUT if possible) (3) Making the HP of the NPC to around 450.
Please add a Mini-TUT in a comment or point me in the direction of which I add these.

item.title: Need help with a NPC problem
item.dc:creator: @mrjad mrjad
item.description:
@mrjad wrote:

BEFORE I EVER post on the help section i always first, search mopar, then google, 9/10 times, its been answered NOT A SPOONFEEDING community, so use your google and mopar search bar and im 100% you will find it

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a NPC problem

item.title: Need help with a NPC problem
item.dc:creator: @Chiller Chiller
item.description:
@Chiller wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Stop making so many topics.

Nobody will spoonfeed you.[/quote]
Ive made 2 topics so be quiet jesus… How about not complain? tyvm
